challenge: Life-altering car accident — panic attacks and anxiety
comeback: Years-long recovery; became HERO of the Year advocate
Joined Jersey Shore Fitness with James Butler (Sep 2007); 'desperate lifestyle alteration'
Came out in 2008; began 'most rewarding and refreshing' months
Spinal microdiscectomy surgery (Dec 15). Post-surgery reflection: 'I Just Want To Wake Up. (I Did!)'
Mediterranean cruise + engagement ring by April — 4 months post-surgery
Gained 3 lbs solid muscle, biked to Highlands/Asbury Park/Sea Bright/Rumson/Deal
Continued travel (Norway, Iceland, Toronto, Montreal) & celebration
